amendment.description: An amendment comprised of the following amendments offered En bloc No. 3 : Amendments Nos. 61, 62, 64, 65, 67, 68, 69, 72, 73, 79, 82, 86, and 89 printed in Part B of House Report 115-295.

action.text: Carter (TX) amendment (A033) modified by unanimous consent. Modification to amendment numbered 79 printed in Part B of House Report 115-295, before "dollar amount" insert "first".

vote.text: On agreeing to the Carter (TX) amendments (A033) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendments en bloc (A033) offered by Mr. Carter (TX).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendments en bloc (A033) offered by Mr. Carter (TX).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Carter (TX) amendments (A033) Agreed to by voice vote.
